android.car.app

类 CarTaskViewClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.car.app.CarTaskViewClient

  • public final class CarTaskViewClient
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the client part of the task view as seen by the server. This wraps the AIDL based communication with the client apps.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Rect getCurrentBoundsOnScreen()
      Returns the current bounds (in pixels) on screen for the task view's view part.
      void onTaskAppeared(ActivityManager.RunningTaskInfo taskInfo, SurfaceControl leash)
      Called when a task has appeared on the TaskView.
      void onTaskInfoChanged(ActivityManager.RunningTaskInfo taskInfo)
      Called when the task in the TaskView is changed.
      void onTaskVanished(ActivityManager.RunningTaskInfo taskInfo)
      Called when a task has vanished from the TaskView.
      void setResizeBackgroundColor(SurfaceControl.Transaction transaction, int color)
      Sets the resize background color on the task view's view part.

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • getCurrentBoundsOnScreen

        public Rect getCurrentBoundsOnScreen()
        Returns the current bounds (in pixels) on screen for the task view's view part.

      • setResizeBackgroundColor

        public void setResizeBackgroundColor(SurfaceControl.Transaction transaction,

        Sets the resize background color on the task view's view part.

        See android.view.SurfaceView#setResizeBackgroundColor(SurfaceControl.Transaction, int)

        Called when a task has appeared on the TaskView.
